code:
json
{
  "name": "projets-gestion",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Application de gestion de projet avec React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "start:dev": "nodemon server.js",
    "build": "react-scripts build",
    "test": "jest",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "start:docker": "docker-compose up --build"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "Votre Nom",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "mongodb": "^3.6.4",
    "mongoose": "^5.10.18",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.2.0",
    "redis": "^3.0.2",
    "socket.io": "^4.5.4"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-eslint": "^10.1.0",
    "eslint": "^7.10.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.24.0",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.12",
    "react-scripts": "^4.0.3",
    "jest": "^27.5.1"
  },
  "jest": {
    "moduleFileExtensions": [
      "js",
      "jsx"
    ],
    "setupFilesAfterEnv": [
      "<rootDir>/setupTests.js"
    ],
    "testEnvironment": "jsdom",
    "testMatch": [
      "**/__tests__/**/*.js?(x)",
      "**/?(*.)+(spec|test).js?(x)"
    ]
  },
  "browserslist": [
    ">0.2%",
    "not dead",
    "not op_mini all"
  ]
}
